announcements.title: Community Website Launch
announcements.summary: We are excited to announce the launch of the official RMV Clusters Phase II community website. Stay updated with the latest news and announcements here.
announcements.body: Welcome to the official RMV Clusters Phase II community website! This platform will serve as the central hub for all community-related information, announcements, guidelines, and more. We encourage all residents to visit regularly for updates.
announcements.author: Management Office

announcements.title: Monthly Maintenance Due Reminder
announcements.summary: Monthly maintenance charges for February 2026 are due by the 10th. Please ensure timely payment to avoid late fees.
announcements.body: This is a reminder that monthly maintenance charges are due by the 10th of every month. Payments can be made via bank transfer or UPI. Details are available at the management office.
announcements.author: Management Office

announcements.title: Water Tank Cleaning - February 15
announcements.summary: Overhead water tank cleaning is scheduled for February 15. Water supply will be interrupted from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM.
announcements.body: As part of regular maintenance, the overhead water tank will be cleaned on February 15, 2026. Water supply will be unavailable between 9:00 AM and 2:00 PM. Residents are advised to store sufficient water for the day.
announcements.author: Maintenance Team

announcements.title: Republic Day Celebration Photos
announcements.summary: Thank you to everyone who joined the Republic Day celebration! Check out the photos from the flag hoisting ceremony and cultural programs.
announcements.body: The Republic Day celebration on January 26 was a wonderful community event. We had a flag hoisting ceremony followed by cultural programs and breakfast. Thank you to all the residents who participated and made it a memorable occasion.
announcements.author: Cultural Committee
